projects.name: Foptimum
projects.description: Foptimum is a lightweight, dockerized app to monitor your internet speed and uptime so you can keep your ISP accountable. Foptimum exports its data to Prometheus so it can easily be visualized with a tool like Grafana. Currently has 1200+ pulls from Dockerhub and is listed on the unRAID app store.
projects.alt: Example metrics generated by Foptimum and displayed in Grafana.

projects.name: This Website!
projects.description: Learn more about how this website was built and see how it was developed over time. Feedback on the website would be greatly appreciated and can be added as a new discussion. Created with React, React-Router, Javascript, TailwindCSS and DaisyUI.
projects.alt: Screenshot of this websites home page.

projects.name: Todo Website
projects.description: A website where you can manage multiple todo lists. Functionality includes, creating and deleting lists, marking tasks as completed, and reordering tasks. Created with React, React-Router, Javascript and CSS.
projects.alt: Screenshot of the todo websites homepage.

projects.name: Set Cover Algorithm
projects.description: Code that will calculate the set cover of a set. This NP-complete problem is solved efficiently by backtracking and pruning the data. Written in Java.
projects.alt: Screenshot of the code for the set cover algorithm.
